item.title: Italian vlog: giorni d'estate e di lavoro a Roma (Subtitles)
item.description:
Italian language video lessons on Italian grammar, vocabulary, and conversation.
‚≠ê My Grammar book: https://www.almaedizioni.it/prodotto/videogrammatica-della-lingua-italiana-1/ ‚≠ê My Italian pronunciation course for beginners and intermediate students: https://www.giulia.school/italian-pronunciation-course
HOW TO SUPPORT MY CHANNEL: - channel membership (various tiers, bonus content and exercise materials) https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCnVc-IW8Q98qFmQcXla5FdQ/join - "Grazie" button below each video to donate if you enjoyed the lesson - Comment, like and subscribe to engage on my channel (this one is free!)
üó£Ô∏è Sign up at Italian language platform Giulia by Treccani to start your journey towards speaking Italian: https://www.giulia.school/?utm_source=youtube&utm_medium=social&utm_campaign=learnitalianwithlucrezia (affiliate link).
MY PODCAST üéôÔ∏è on SoundCloud: https://goo.gl/JVqMbM üéôÔ∏è on Apple Podcasts: https://goo.gl/VSmnxB üéôÔ∏è on Spotify: https://goo.gl/EFQyQu üéôÔ∏è on Amazon Music and Audible: https://amzn.to/3NVoNCK
üì∏ Instagram @lucreziaoddone http://bit.ly/LucreziaOnTheGram
üéµ Listen to my selection of Italian songs: https://open.spotify.com/playlist/6gHVsQ8qLA4vWEaqasMVKN?si=mq1lFAP4QFycmpeIxGglfA
LEZIONI PI√ô RICHIESTE / MOST REQUESTED LESSONS: ‚è© How to use CI: https://youtu.be/9QghqoPKd10 ‚è© How to use NE: https://youtu.be/v-5I3nEoidg ‚è© Imperfetto VS Passato Prossimo: https://youtu.be/OSxi6BvDuqg ‚è© Pronomi diretti (direct object pronouns): https://youtu.be/phPIGvfq10E ‚è© Pronomi indiretti (indirect object pronouns): https://youtu.be/sR-32mlILXE
Thank you for watching and for choosing to learn Italian with me!
